body: The only lesson of hentai is that to get laid, (1) you need to be proactive, (2) you need to be well-endowed and (3) you need to not be considerate at all about the other males. Not gonna lie, this is true even IRL. All girls say ‘I know what I want and it's not one-night shots’ but at the end of the day, that's just the worst lie ever. I'm sad for Nakatani since now, I'd like him to find a good match, but is that even possible?
Not ntr just love competition
He has the true incel energy. The MC is dead inside.
Considering that this is hentai world, you can think that he can also NTR back any of the girls here. He may lose the competition but he can always steal them back.

@HentaiKingTestamentBasara
A slut? Girls want to have sex just like guys you know.
She didnt even neccesarily like mc in the first place, she said she was waiting for a man to approach her.
Once one did, she accepted their advance. 
Happens irl too, the really pretty girls in school that are still single that all the guys like actually dont get romantically pursued cause all the guys are too scared of getting friendzoned and the like

@OWL Well this is a surprise and another realistic scene, pretty interesting. What happened in the parts before turned into just a bitter memories of his youth. It’s amazing that they’re still a group though, I guess MC swallowed his pride (?) and decided to keep in touch with them. He will turn into that married guy who talked about “his best friend stole his lover in highschool” in social medias, lol. Hey, at least he’s a happy man now

Well, what do you know, an NTR that actually doesn’t feel that bad. I mean, throw away the MC and we got the usual, “the side couple being a wingmen by showing how they fuck”. Like seriously, in the first part, he doesn’t even look at his love interest but focusing on side couple fucking instead and in this one, despite already realizing that his friend and his lover are fucking he just sits on the sands and not trying to look for them. But oh well, I mean, this shit is basically “your best friend stole your girl” pretty realistic since it’s not a rare occurance

@Owl checked out the one you linked and wrote a summary of it all. But pretty much the MC here get's semi-forced by his boss to hook up with a divorcee cause she thinks their a perfect match. Then the end pages is pretty much, they get yelled at, 2 months later, discover she's pregnant they get engaged, maybe everything happened cause it was meant for the MC to get connected with the new gal.

The MC got a happy ending in the end. 
You could see his "friends" and him all got together with their significant others at page 80. It is not translated yet though, so I can't really understand. But by gist of the MC met a new girl years later and got together with her.

Here is the continuation: https://nhentai.net/g/314108/
Finally, a good impregnation manga , hahahhahaha. Enjoyed the story 9/10.
Finally after two years since the first chapter it's finally translated..

ty for the translation finally. i feel bad for the MC. it wasnt necessarily his fault but the odds were definitely against him. i wouldnt be surprised if he stopped being friends with all of them after this.

ehhmmm dunno why the fuck this needed a 2nd part but  well xD  its not like anyone here will re-read again right? so take it easy since its NTR it was settled that this was going to happen and like close to almost every NTR the RAPE guy will win the girl at the end  hahaha so easy bros there are some nice NTR with pretty nice endings that MC get revenge and pretty good revenge  so read some of those if you want to wash the bitter end of this shit.
Finally !
proofreading this was hell

bastards, fall in love with each other just cause of fucking and betray mc and  behave in the end so casually and sweet together like they do nothing  wrong and not cheating sexaddicted  trashes which just throw away mc, who actully they are but they act like they some kind innocent lovebirds, twisted and nasty humiliating absurd shit like always, yes this just a fiction and specific of genre but i dont care this disgust me as hell and i just say my opinion about that, i dont want to offende anyone, peace)
Thanks for translation, I loved the original so much.
page 85, girl hand like Boy sex, don't girl go away...
an other blackpill who show us that the nice beta guy will never get the girls lmao
What a loser guy...
Yess Finally it got translated
First come first serve doesn’t matter if you break the BRO CODE. Leftover-kun should go get new friends who won’t fuck around on him. His crush was a slut in mentality tho
I'm guessing that Nakatani will no longer be friends with them anymore. Now he will be truly alone.
It was a decent attempt at a leftover NTR scenario, but not quite there yet in terms of art and story.
Even Nakatani has make move first but if he got micro dick he will lost his crush anyway. Just NTR rule.
trash art trash story
This TL team could have TL'd something better ohw ell.
thanks for the translation. been waiting for this for ages. leftover ntr is my favorite kind of ntr

Normally this scenario is my favorite type of NTR where the MC is too slow to react and his friend gets the girl instead, but the main girl is just so unlikeable and tepid about everything, it's so far from reality it makes it hard to enjoy. The art is lackluster at best too, so along with the shitty written characters, this one is just hard to fap to. 
Shame because there aren't many doujins that execute on the despair and powerlessness of the best friend stealing your crush dynamic.
The curly hair was a dick head too. i swear he said he had a crush on some other girl in the first chapter. So sad for the MC, could've shot that.
Tbh u don't like the guys. It's your bros crush so you don't touch her. He broke the bro code man. I'm into ntr but still. Breaking the bro-code is the worst offense you could do
Need to add a leftover in a vanilla story, i don't get it, if anything don't be like him.

That friendship is over.
I guess first come first served. Even if you try to warn your friend not come near your crush by declaring you like her first. Maybe he should have confessed to her too.
